QuestData.Title: Return to Razor Hill
QuestData.Description: My wind riders are trained to fly to many different places, as long as you have already been to that place and spoken with the wind rider master there.$B$BYou have been to Razor Hill and spoken to their wind rider master Burok, so now you can fly directly to him from here. Once you're at Razor Hill, you can deliver Gryshka's letter to Grimtak.$B$BSpeak with me when you are ready to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Buy a wind rider to Razor Hill from the wind rider master Doras, then bring Gryshka's Letter to Grimtak at Razor Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you returned from Orgrimmar? Did Gryshka like the meat I sent her?
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! I guess she liked it! Nothing brings red to a lady's cheeks like a big, juicy steak!$B$BThank you, $N. You've done me a great service. Here is some money for your trouble, and don't be surprised if I invite you to my wedding!
